revenge is a dish best eaten cold

word_group.brief_definition: 报复袭击；复仇袭击；报复攻击
报复性杀戮；复仇杀戮；仇杀
部落的复仇；部族的复仇；种族的复仇

bilingual.source: He is afraid of the sinister gang's revenge.
He seeks revenge because he was bullied.
bilingual.target: 他因为被欺负而寻求报复。

bilingual.source: She decided to seek revenge for her family.
bilingual.target: 她决定寻求报复，为她的家人讨回公道。

bilingual.source: They plan to seek revenge to restore their honor.
bilingual.target: 他们计划寻求报复，以此来恢复他们的荣誉。

bilingual.source: She chose the nobler path of forgiveness instead of revenge.
bilingual.target: 她选择了宽恕而不是报复的更高尚的道路。

bilingual.source: A true Jedi never seeks revenge but strives for justice.
bilingual.target: 真正的绝地武士从不寻求报复，而是追求正义。

bilingual.source: A vindictive person often seeks revenge for minor offenses.
bilingual.target: 一个怀有报复心的人经常会为小过错寻求报复。

bilingual.source: The character seeks revenge in the movie, shocking the audience.
bilingual.target: 那个角色在电影中寻求报复，让观众感到震惊。

bilingual.source: He spent years seeking revenge, but eventually chose forgiveness.
bilingual.target: 他花了几年时间寻求报复，但最终选择了原谅。

bilingual.source: The movie's plot revolves around a cuckold seeking revenge.
bilingual.target: 电影的情节围绕一个被戴绿帽子的男人寻求报复展开。

list.abstract: 1981年于英国成军的前卫电子合成音乐传奇团体Eurythimics，自1983年首张专辑＜In The Garden＞推出后，一直以其特的前卫幻化音符与精致的合成效果以及女主唱Annie Lennox的实力唱腔而独树一格，于80年代英美两地独领风骚。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me you didn't sleep with Chuck for revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别告诉我，你和恰克上床是为了报复。

yingyinNormal.en: What a jerk. You're good at revenge; how do we get him back?
yingyinNormal.zh: 混蛋。你擅长报复，我们该怎么治治他？

yingyinNormal.en: Would you look at this dump? He hated us. This is his final revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看这个猪窝？他痛恨我们！这是他最终的报复！

yingyinNormal.en: You blame the system for what you are. Instead of yourself. You wanted revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把变成现在这样的原因归咎于制度，而不是你自己，你想报复。

yingyinNormal.en: I was so lost in hatred and revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很后悔，仇恨和复仇蒙蔽了我。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, he certainly got his revenge. Civilians?
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然他已经复仇得逞，平民方面呢？

yingyinNormal.en: This is Dwarf gold. And we will have our revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是矮人的黄金，看矮人怎么复仇吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Or one of his previous targets is coming back for revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也或许是他之前的某个目标回来报仇了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to go do some shopping for revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，恕我失陪，我要去购物，买点复仇用品！

yingyinNormal.en: Revenge is not good once you're done. Believe. It's better to forget.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦开始复仇，就不会有好结果的，相信我，还是忘了好。

yingyinNormal.en: But you know what is? Revenge. We hear it's best served cold. Who's hungry?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你知道吗？君子报仇，十年不晚，现在谁先饿了呢？

yingyinNormal.en: What kind of revenge is that? This woman screwed with my job. She's got to pay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这算哪门子的报仇啊？这臭娘们破坏我工作，我得整死她。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to do something! We can't let him march on the valley, take his revenge!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得马上行动，不能让太狼回到和谷村来报仇，荼害百姓。

yingyinNormal.en: The only thing that has kept me going all these years is my burning thirst for revenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么多年支撑我的唯一信念就是一定要报仇！

yingyinNormal.en: I deserve revenge. As do I, my love. But do not use a battering ram when an arrow will do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我应当复仇。我也是，吾爱，但杀鸡焉用宰牛刀。

yingyinNormal.en: Our first instinct is to seek revenge when those we love are taken from us. But that's not who we are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当有人抢走我们爱的人，我们的第一反应是复仇，但这不是我们的天性。

yingyinNormal.en: Can. That's how this whole revenge thing works. And with this, I finally have the power to destroy you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然可以，这就是复仇，用这个，我就可以彻底摧毁你们。

yingyinNormal.en: Is this Plutarch's idea? It was mine. It balances the need for revenge with the least loss of human life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是普鲁塔什的主意吗？是我的，这样可以在报仇雪恨和减少死亡中取得平衡。

yingyinNormal.en: And for 25 years I planned my revenge against the Federation. And forgot what it was like to live a normal life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我计划了25年，我都忘记该如何正常的生活了。

yingyinNormal.en: Who could it have been? Sheldon, what did you do? I plotted my revenge. If you get a dish, I'll serve you some cold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那会是谁干的呢？谢尔顿，你做了什么？我策划了我的报仇大计。如果你有盘子，我就为你呈上一盘复仇。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
